title: Divinity Original Sin (Source Hunter DLC) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the DLC for Divinity Original Sin. Im srry it took so long but it here now. I forgot to add the extra content in the torrent. If you really want it, just request in the comment section and I upload it in a few days. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.


--------------


What's cool about it:


- Unlocks Divinity Original Sin: The Golden Grail DLC, Divinity Original Sin: Zandalor's Trunks DLC, Divinity: Original Sin Design Documents and Art Pack, and Soundtrack.


Overview:

This DLC pack contains Divinity Original Sin Design Documents, a Divinity Original Sin Art Pack, the Divinity Original Sin Soundtrack, an in-game item called The Golden Grail (which can turn items into gold) and an in-game item "Zandalor's Trunks", magical underwear that comments on whatever is going on.

Multiplayer notice: Multiplayer is only available via Direct IP or LAN.
